metadata.title: CVE-2024-25260 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: elfutils v0.189 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference viathe handle_verdef() function at readelf.c.

criterions.comment: elfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
